| History                 = The Carbone Crime Family were infiltrated by the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]]. Due to the threat that the Asian and Middle Eastern mobs posed to the [[Cosa Nostra (Earth-616)|Cosa Nostra]], the family attempted to convince the American and European branches of the Cosa Nostra to unite. The Cosa Nostra held a summit on the [[Isla de Tiburon]] in the Gulf of Mexico. The Punisher and [[J. R. Walker (Earth-616)|Shotgun]] slaughtered every capo at the summit.{{r|Punisher: War Zone Vol 1 1|6}} 

[[Rosalie Carbone (Earth-616)|Rosalie Carbone]], then seized control of the family.{{r|Punisher: War Zone Vol 1 7}} Under her leadership, the family was a major player in the underworld. It financed the  drug trade for the East Coast, was involved in the bookmaking and policy rackets, and had influence over trucking and [[New York City]]'s food center.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 100}}
